metadata.description: Mapping specification for AE domain transformation

variable_mappings.label: Study Identifier
variable_mappings.comments: Study Identifier - Required variable. Maps from STUDY source column containing 'MAXIS-08'

variable_mappings.label: Domain Abbreviation
variable_mappings.comments: Domain Abbreviation - Required variable. Fixed value for Adverse Events domain

variable_mappings.label: Unique Subject Identifier
variable_mappings.comments: Unique Subject Identifier - Required variable. Standard derivation combining study, site, and subject identifiers. INVSITE present in source.

variable_mappings.label: Sequence Number
variable_mappings.transformation: Use as-is if valid, otherwise regenerate
variable_mappings.comments: Sequence Number - Required variable. Source has AESEQ column. Validate and regenerate if needed to ensure sequential ordering per subject

variable_mappings.label: Reported Term for the Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: Reported Term for the Adverse Event - Required variable. AECOD contains verbatim terms like 'NAUSEA', 'INTERMITTENT VOMITING', etc.

variable_mappings.label: Dictionary-Derived Term
variable_mappings.comments: Dictionary-Derived Term - Expected variable. AEPTT contains MedDRA Preferred Terms like 'NAUSEA', 'VOMITING', 'BACK PAIN'

variable_mappings.label: Body System or Organ Class
variable_mappings.comments: Body System or Organ Class - Expected variable. AESCT contains SOC terms like 'GASTROINTESTINAL DISORDERS'

variable_mappings.label: Primary System Organ Class
variable_mappings.transformation: Use MedDRA Primary System Organ Class
variable_mappings.comments: Primary System Organ Class - Permissible variable. Same as AEBODSYS for primary SOC

variable_mappings.label: Severity/Intensity
variable_mappings.transformation: Map to CDISC controlled terminology: Keep MILD/MODERATE/SEVERE as-is
variable_mappings.comments: Severity/Intensity - Expected variable. Source already contains CDISC terms (MILD, MODERATE, SEVERE). Validate against AESEV codelist

variable_mappings.label: Serious Event
variable_mappings.comments: Serious Event - Expected variable. Source has AESER column. Ensure values are Y or N only

variable_mappings.label: Action Taken with Study Treatment
variable_mappings.comments: Action Taken with Study Treatment - Expected variable. AEACT contains action taken information. Map to standard ACN values (DOSE REDUCED, DOSE NOT CHANGED, DRUG WITHDRAWN, etc.)

variable_mappings.label: Causality
variable_mappings.comments: Causality - Expected variable. Source has both AEREL and AERELL. Map values like 'POSSIBLE', 'UNLIKELY', 'UNRELATED' to AEREL codelist (NOT RELATED, POSSIBLY RELATED, PROBABLY RELATED, RELATED)

variable_mappings.label: Outcome of Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: Outcome of Adverse Event - Expected variable. Source has AEOUTC and AEOUTCL. AEOUTCL shows 'RESOLVED'. Map to OUT codelist (RECOVERED/RESOLVED, RECOVERING/RESOLVING, NOT RECOVERED/NOT RESOLVED, FATAL, UNKNOWN)

variable_mappings.label: Start Date/Time of Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: Start Date/Time of Adverse Event - Expected variable. Source has numeric dates (20080910, 200812). Convert to ISO 8601 format preserving precision

variable_mappings.label: End Date/Time of Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: End Date/Time of Adverse Event - Expected variable. Source has numeric dates with some nulls. Convert to ISO 8601 format preserving precision

variable_mappings.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
variable_mappings.comments: Sponsor-Defined Identifier - Permissible variable. PrimaryKEY can serve as unique AE identifier within the study

variable_mappings.label: Modified Reported Term
variable_mappings.comments: Modified Reported Term - Permissible variable. AEVERB may contain investigator-modified verbatim term

variable_mappings.label: Primary System Organ Class Code
variable_mappings.comments: Primary System Organ Class Code - Permissible variable. MedDRA SOC numeric code

variable_mappings.label: High Level Group Term Code
variable_mappings.comments: High Level Group Term Code - Permissible variable. MedDRA HLGT numeric code

variable_mappings.label: High Level Group Term
variable_mappings.comments: High Level Group Term - Permissible variable. All values are null in sample, may be populated in full dataset

variable_mappings.label: High Level Term Code
variable_mappings.comments: High Level Term Code - Permissible variable. MedDRA HLT numeric code

variable_mappings.label: High Level Term
variable_mappings.comments: High Level Term - Permissible variable. AEHTT contains terms like 'NAUSEA AND VOMITING SYMPTOMS'

variable_mappings.label: Lowest Level Term Code
variable_mappings.comments: Lowest Level Term Code - Permissible variable. MedDRA LLT numeric code

variable_mappings.label: Lowest Level Term
variable_mappings.comments: Lowest Level Term - Permissible variable. MedDRA Lowest Level Term

variable_mappings.label: Preferred Term Code
variable_mappings.comments: Preferred Term Code - Permissible variable. MedDRA PT numeric code corresponding to AEPTT

variable_mappings.label: Other Action Taken
variable_mappings.comments: Other Action Taken - Permissible variable. Free text for actions not covered by AEACN codelist

variable_mappings.label: Pattern of Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: Pattern of Adverse Event - Permissible variable. May need derivation logic based on recurrence and temporal patterns

variable_mappings.label: Results in Death
variable_mappings.comments: Results in Death - Expected variable. Derive from seriousness criteria. Check AESERL for death indicator

variable_mappings.label: Requires or Prolongs Hospitalization
variable_mappings.comments: Requires or Prolongs Hospitalization - Expected variable. Check AESERL for hospitalization indicator

variable_mappings.label: Is Life Threatening
variable_mappings.comments: Is Life Threatening - Expected variable. Check AESERL for life-threatening indicator

variable_mappings.label: Persist or Signif Disability/Incapacity
variable_mappings.comments: Persist or Signif Disability/Incapacity - Expected variable. Check AESERL for disability indicator

variable_mappings.label: Congenital Anomaly or Birth Defect
variable_mappings.comments: Congenital Anomaly or Birth Defect - Expected variable. Check AESERL for congenital anomaly indicator

variable_mappings.label: Other Medically Important Serious Event
variable_mappings.comments: Other Medically Important Serious Event - Expected variable. Check AESERL for other medically important criteria

variable_mappings.label: Concomitant or Additional Trtmnt Given
variable_mappings.comments: Concomitant or Additional Trtmnt Given - Permissible variable. AETRT indicates if treatment was given (Y/N)

variable_mappings.label: Visit Name
variable_mappings.comments: Visit Name - SDTM Timing variable. Links AE to visit structure if applicable

variable_mappings.label: Study Day of Start of Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: Study Day of Start of Adverse Event - Permissible variable. Requires reference start date from DM domain

variable_mappings.label: Study Day of End of Adverse Event
variable_mappings.comments: Study Day of End of Adverse Event - Permissible variable. Requires reference start date from DM domain

variable_mappings.label: Relationship to Non-Study Treatment
variable_mappings.transformation: Map to AEREL codelist for non-study treatment relationship
variable_mappings.comments: Causality for Non-Study Treatment - Permissible variable. AERELL may represent relationship to non-study treatment if study tracks this separately

variable_mappings.label: AEREPNUM
variable_mappings.comments: Repeat Number - Permissible variable. REPEATSN may indicate repeat occurrence number for recurring events

variable_mappings.label: AESUBEV
variable_mappings.comments: Sub-Event - Permissible variable. SUBEVE may indicate this is a sub-event of a parent event

derivation_rules.AESEQ: ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY USUBJID ORDER BY AEDTC)
derivation_rules.AESTDY: AESTDTC - RFSTDTC + 1 (if AESTDTC >= RFSTDTC) else AESTDTC - RFSTDTC
derivation_rules.AEENDY: AEENDTC - RFSTDTC + 1 (if AEENDTC >= RFSTDTC) else AEENDTC - RFSTDTC
derivation_rules.AESEV: Apply BR-AE-003: Map 1/MILD -> MILD, 2/MODERATE -> MODERATE, 3/SEVERE -> SEVERE
derivation_rules.AEREL: Use AEREL if present, otherwise use AERELL as fallback
derivation_rules.AEOUT: Use AEOUTC if present, otherwise use AEOUTCL
derivation_rules.AESTDTC: Convert AESTDT from numeric YYYYMMDD or YYYYMM format to ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM). Handle partial dates: 200812 -> 2008-12, 20080910 -> 2008-09-10
derivation_rules.AEENDTC: Convert AEENDT from numeric YYYYMMDD or YYYYMM format to ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM). Handle partial dates and nulls (148 null values present)
derivation_rules.AESPID: Convert numeric PrimaryKEY to character string
derivation_rules.AEMODIFY: Populate only if AEVERB differs from AECOD, indicating modified term
derivation_rules.AESOCCD: Convert AESCC to numeric MedDRA SOC code
derivation_rules.AEHLGTCD: Convert AEHGC to numeric MedDRA HLGT code
derivation_rules.AEHLTCD: Convert AEHTC to numeric MedDRA HLT code
derivation_rules.AELLTCD: Convert AELTC to numeric MedDRA LLT code
derivation_rules.AEPTCD: Convert AEPTC to numeric MedDRA PT code
derivation_rules.AEACNOTH: Populate when action taken is 'OTHER' with description from AEACTL
derivation_rules.AEPATT: Analyze multiple records per subject to identify patterns (INTERMITTENT, CONTINUOUS, SINGLE EVENT)
derivation_rules.AESDTH: Derive from AESER='Y' and AEOUT='FATAL' or AESERL serious criteria
derivation_rules.AESHOSP: Derive from AESERL serious criteria for hospitalization
derivation_rules.AESLIFE: Derive from AESERL serious criteria for life-threatening
derivation_rules.AESDISAB: Derive from AESERL serious criteria for disability
derivation_rules.AESCONG: Derive from AESERL serious criteria for congenital anomaly
derivation_rules.AESMIE: Derive from AESERL serious criteria for medically important event
derivation_rules.AERELNST: Use AERELL if tracking relationship to non-study treatment separately
